website_summaries.verdict: A potent hemp protein powder at a bargain price, but it is a little gritty.
pros: Goes well in a fruit smoothie
Keeps you feeling full for hours
cons: Has a gritty texture that some consumers find unpleasant

customer_reviews.title: If your protein is a pale green color, send it back. It will make you sick.
customer_reviews.text: I’d like to preface this and say that I’ve been using hemp protein for months now. I just received my latest shipment and the color was a bit off. It’s usually a more vibrant green but this one was pale green. Anyway, I started using it and became really sick and nasaeous. This never happened before. I continued to use it and the symptoms just became worse. A week later after I stopped using it, I feel better. My point is that make sure your protein is not pale and that it is a rich green color.
customer_reviews.author: Kemal

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect nutrition facts?!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product and while and I enjoy blending it into smoothies and have always been happy with it. Until this most recent order arrived, the nutrition facts don’t add up or even make sense.
customer_reviews.author: sarah smith

customer_reviews.title: Hemp, its whats for your body!
customer_reviews.text: Mix with vanilla almond mild and shake it up, the vanilla covers a good portion of the grainy/green taste of the protein powder. Add more vanilla flavoring until you find your comfort zone. I don't mind the grainy so much, as it's not a soda, its GOOD for you, so buck up and feed your bod! Peace my fellow humans! Update: Orange juice and vanilla flavoring seems to reallly cover up the earth taste, but if you don't want the extra sugar from the oj, skip it! This stuff adds stamina to your day and curbs hunger, i might even say it calms the nerves while driving to the job, ARGGGHH!!
customer_reviews.author: DaveD

customer_reviews.title: There is a warning that this product: "CANCER AND REPRODUCTIVE HARM"
customer_reviews.text: This specific side on the 30 Oz packaging is not displayed in the product images or nothing has been mentioned about this warning in the product description. I do not know why this warning is on a hemp protein product, but after reading this warning on the packaging I will not consume Nutiva`s hemp product.
customer_reviews.author: akanksha

customer_reviews.title: Has hemp hulls
customer_reviews.text: This product has a lot of ground up indigestible hemp hulls leaving a sandy silt at the bottom of the glass. The hull remnants have the look and consistency of ground pepper. There are pros and cons to whether it's good to eat hemp hulls or not. Pros is more bulk fiber, cons is less nutrition per volume/weight. I'm hoping the hulls aren't figuring into the mineral and protein content because they have zero digestibility. That aside, the taste is decent and there are no additives and price is good.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: If you're like me and can't stand even the slightest taste of ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and can't stand even the slightest taste of protein/whey, this product is going to be your protein life saver! I've tried so many different protein powders and this is the best hands down. Plus it has added benefits as well. I just put one or two scoops into my blender with a frozen banana and some almond milk and it becomes a delicious green smoothie. It doesn't really add any taste, just a grittier texture. This does not bother me since I don't chew my smoothies as I drink. Can't say enough good things about this powder.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: We really like the quality of the product
customer_reviews.text: This is our second order. We really like the quality of the product, but the second shipment was short about 30% of the powdered protein product as compared with the first shipment. We transferred the second shipment of the product into the same size container as we did with the first shipment and we could easily see that about 30% of the powdered protein product was missing! We are sure that the shipper did not do this intentionally, because they only reship the product manufactured by someone else. We hope the shipper reads this and contacts us and make the purchase good.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Contains lead
customer_reviews.text: Description claims product is clean, pure, free of chemicals, organic, etc but surreptitiously fails to mention the CA Prop 65 warning in fine print on back of label! (Due to containing LEAD)
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: My body could not digest this product
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t vomited in over twenty years, but ingesting this powder had me throwing up all night. Just a warning, or reassurance for anyone else experiencing this. You are not alone. This is my second day home from work recovering.
customer_reviews.author: Jay T. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder ive found.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Dont expect zero taste and no texture (because tbh, if a protein powder has those qualities, its likely junk) but in almond milk with a banana and some frozen berries, spinach and sweetened with honey if you like, its kind of a treat. Very happy with what it offers in amino acids and fats, fiber and protein. If its hard for you to get down, use 1 tbspn instead of 3 and have two more through out the day. Youll get more fruit in your diet anyway which is never bad. I also love that my 2 yr old likes them (unsweetened for him) and fills him up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing could have prepared me for that taste
customer_reviews.text: I've used tons of whey proteins before now switching to plant-based (vegan) protein options. The shift in taste took a bit to acclimate but I got used to it. But this. This is just another level of bad. No amount of people telling me it "tastes like dirt" would have prepared me for how awful it tastes. I'm still giving it a 4/5 because it carries a multitide of obvious health benefits and it can still be enjoyed if you mix it in with a LOT of other tastes for a smoothie, but it loses one star because oh my god the taste
customer_reviews.author: Josef Karlos V. Bitanga

customer_reviews.title: grown to love!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried it I didn't like it. But...that was because I was used to a vanilla or chocolate whey smoothie in the morning. Now I think that is like drinking candy in the morning. I now mix this with almond milk a banana maybe some strawberries and it tastes pretty good I was drinking the whey smoothies for my health so I just had to adjust my thinking on this and now I love it. I see it has gone up a few dollars since I ordered. I hope that doesn't continue, this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Earthy, better for protein shakes than cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to add protein to food but only in very small quantities. It leaves an overpowering earthy taste that tends to mask all other flavors - and I love to cook with garlic! I prefer to use hemp seeds in my cooking instead. This product is probably best as a morning protein shake if you mix with green fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Decker

customer_reviews.title: Helps to make my skin beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my shakes. It has high protein (humans don't need a lot of protein in their diet--research it because the bodybuilding industry has sold you a lie) but I like that it has NO SODIUM. This hemp protein powder is a complete protein (meaning: it contains all nine essential amino acids, which are the building blocks of protein that help repair muscles, grow tissue, and support vital organs), it's packed with antioxidants, minerals, fiber, and heart-healthy unsaturated fats. You can't taste it in a smoothie, so why not throw it in? :)
customer_reviews.author: Gone with the Kale

customer_reviews.title: Smells/Tastes Like mowing the lawn
customer_reviews.text: LOL this stuff is awful. I fell pray to "Oh the 24oz is only XX more..." Definitely try before you buy. I've been working out for 20 years and had all sorts of bad protein powders...but I think this one takes the cake. Is it edible? Sure. If you enjoy inhaling the grass clippings after you've mowed the lawn then this is for you! It over powers anything you put it in. Do you like being gassy for hours? You'll LOVE this. I've tried this over the last two weeks in different varieties. Soy milk, Almond milk, berries, kale/spinach, etc. They should call this Hemp fiber. It's closer to a fiber one or metamucil then a protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: Shobizzle

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: As someone else on here said, this stuff isn't meant to be a delicious flavorful addition to a smoothy, it's for good digestive roughage. If you want something that has a fine consistency and that you're not gonna notice in your shake, then find another protein powder. I love this stuff because it has really helped my colon health, and is a great way to add protein to my morning shakes. It also doesn't make me feel gassy and bloated like a lot of other plant based protein powders do, so that in itself makes this stuff worth every dime. If you're realistic about fiber and plant based protein, then this is a great powder for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gaspard

customer_reviews.title: Good, but gritty
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I recommend this product. I mix it in with vegetable juice and the flavor is very good, like a bean soup. The flavor of the powder itself is similar to pinto beans, which I enjoy. The powder is also very nutritious and filling, working well for a meal replacement. The only downside is the texture: powdery and gritty even when completely mixed into juice or a shake. That being said, the positives far outweigh that one negative. If you can sacrifice texture for taste, then I'd say buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: Fresh herbal green taste and mixes easily in any liquid so far.
customer_reviews.text: Herbal green scent. Soft fine powder. I tried several ways and all were delicious. 1. Mixed in a blender with banana and splash of hemp milk. Good! 2. Tb spoon hand stirred in a cup of water. Easily mixed and just tasted like a fresh green drink. Good flavor but I’m someone who loves wheatgrass flavor. 3. Hand mixed a tb in a 1/2 c of oat/almond milk. My favorite so far! Creamy and tasty. I’m hoping to get my extra protein. I’m working up to 2 tbs a day
customer_reviews.author: OPAL

customer_reviews.title: awesome protein
customer_reviews.text: I’ve consistently repurchased this brand. I use the powder for a smoothie I use as a meal replacement or busy mornings or days I am not hungry, but need to eat. The powder is fine, blends well and is as good on the first serving as the last. I refrigerate it after opening and one canister tends to last me months. My only suggestion would be less wasteful and unsustainable packaging. Plastics are a product of the petroleum industry so I would prefer a cardboard container that is more easily recycled. No plastic, please. Regardless, I do think Nutiva brand is of good quality, especially this hemp powder!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R. Graves

customer_reviews.title: It’s great if you like dirt water!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, if you get this... I hope you’re mixing it with something. If not, I hope you like dirt water because that’s what this taste like. It tastes like I went outside and scooped up some of the dirt and added water. Drinking this was miserable. And if you let it sit for more than 10 seconds, the hemp will go to the bottom and water to the top. So gross.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't actually think I'd get through a whole bag, but now I'm halfway through my second. It's just so convenient to have before my workouts, since eating a "proper" breakfast leaves me feeling too full and uncomfortable. The fact that it also sneaks green things into my diet is just a plus. I've also experimented with it in baking a little bit, and it definitely has potential.
customer_reviews.author: Illustrious

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to gluten, dairy/whey, legumes including pea protein among other things. I have finally found something with good protein grams as well as all of the other benefits like amino acids that natural hemp is known for. It’s protein powder so taste, well it isn’t horrible at all but it’s still protein powder. Blends great in hand shaker and is really fresh.
customer_reviews.author: S Blue

customer_reviews.title: For my health
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to supplement my diet during cancer treatment. Radiation from throat cancer made it difficult to eat. This protein powder definitely made a difference in maintaining my weight during treatment. I mixed it with a smoothie that I would have twice a day. Treatment is over and I'm still using it. It's organic and it's hemp. Do some research and you will find that hemp protein without all the extras is the best for you. Plan to use it as part of my regular diet from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Golfnut

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This review is based solely on the flavor. I just put 3 T in 6 oz of milk (cow), shook it up and drank it. Lovely sweet, nutty flavor. It dissolves nicely with some sediment at the bottom which I swished around as I drank the last bit of it and it dissolved too so I got the entire serving. I'll probably use it in my breakfast drink in a healthier carrier. But as a quick pick me up it will do very nicely. Thank you Nutiva for a great product and AMZN for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Brauer

customer_reviews.title: Love it - you are supposed to refrigerate!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great vegetarian/vegan option. It does have a grassy flavor, but is overpowered by almost anything else you blend it with. There is a bit of a grittiness to it, but you'll be used to that if you used most any other protein powder in the past. Heads up, you are supposed to refrigerate this after opening!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Mix it in with other stuff...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Get ready for some fiber! This stuff has it and isn't messing around. It hits you right away. You won't be disappointed. Also, it has some serious iron content for those that give blood regularly. Cons: It's pretty dry, even after mixed in with other ingredients. You really have to mix it in with other flavors to get rid of the flavor of this product. The flavor is not as bad as spirulina, but it's a close contender.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S.

customer_reviews.title: Helping my gut.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Was using Citrucel fiber for IBS which helped, but this is so much better. Highly nutritional, and better for my gut. Must start slowly in dose to adapt to more fiber. This has 4 grams per tablespoon. Not a smoothie flavor, but natural and earthy. I keep stirring in glass as drink to keep powder from settling. Doing it for my health. Highly recommend. Hemp protein powder is said to be high in magnesium. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Magic Dust

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only protein shake I’ve ever taken that does not give me ... the farts. ;) It’s also a great probiotic. I highly recommend this if you have had issues with other protein shakes. Kinda tastes like peanuts and sprouts.
customer_reviews.author: alexander

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add protein and fiber to your diet
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!! I have bought it many times. It’s a great way to add protein and fiber to your diet. It’s not that great tasting in smoothies unless you add bananas or peanut butter to help hide the flavor. I like to use this when I make healthy oatmeal breakfast bars or add it in pancakes and oatmeal. I make protein balls and add this In it as well. It blends and mixes up nicely. I’ll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Mom & Kid Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for years. It’s my go-to hemp based protein powder. I put it in all different types of smoothies and never even notice/taste the powder. I also make smoothies for my 7 year old with this and she never seems to notice either.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Great when you adjust to the taste!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for about a month now to try to build lean muscle for rock climbing. It's probably just a placebo effect, but I've been feeling strong. The taste is definitely something you have to get used to, but it only took about two weeks to adjust to the very rope-y taste. I've experimented with a few recipes, and have decided that this is best when blended with vanilla yogurt (high protein), vanilla pea milk (high protein), orange juice, and mango chunks. I actually kind of enjoy the odd taste now. I'll continue to use this as my protein.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Good nutritional value
customer_reviews.text: I previously used Vega One protein powder; however, a new company took over and changed the recipe, using questionable ingredients. My "model" daughter highly recommended the Nutiva Hemp Protein, and I have been using it for over 8 mos., with good results. I like that it only contains hemp seed! I found that mixing it with Almond milk improved the taste over Unsweetened Coconut milk. My only "issue" is that I have not been able to keep the bag sealed, and I'm on my 3rd bag, and keep a rubber band around it. Otherwise, I would highly recommend this product for its nutritional value.
customer_reviews.author: The Rev.

customer_reviews.title: Also great for post-workouts
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard part of my diet! I was hesitant about protein powder to begin with, then had trouble finding one that I was okay with the ingredients (I don't do whey, soy, corn, or wheat). I take a smoothie with this protein powder to work (I work 12 hour shifts and can never eat enough), this helps get me through until lunch time. Also great for post-workouts. And this one didn't break the bank! Even cheaper is you subscribe to receive between 1-6 months.
customer_reviews.author: RN Climber

customer_reviews.title: Hemp protein is an absolute must
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute must for anyone detoxing or simply needing more protein! the taste is great for me. Some people complain, but they're the reason everything is overly sweet. If you like your greens without a ton of processed dressing on it, you'll love this green tasting hemp protein!
customer_reviews.author: Falcoln

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder out there
customer_reviews.text: I use this every morning in my green smoothie along with organic fruits, vegetables, coconut water and ice. It doesn’t alter the flavor of my smoothie and sustains me all morning. My day isn’t the same without it. I love that it is only one ingredient and that the company is socially responsible. I’m vegan and appreciate the quality and simplicity. A lot of protein powder has a million ingredients or stevia or flavoring or things I don’t want like rice. Or of course whey, which as a vegan, I would never consider.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie A. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Very gritty
customer_reviews.text: Taste is one to be desired I suppose. Very gritty, no scoop to measure. I'm used to drinking Organifi products which are the best I have ever used. I can usually drink anything but no way I could get this down. I mixed it into my Organifi protein powder to be able to drink it. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: The packaging is awful
customer_reviews.text: I love the actual product, the powder really doesn't have a taste if you blend it with something like a banana or put it into savory foods and it doesn't disolve but it mixes pretty well. The only problem I have: the packaging. Non recyclable, and impossible to keep using unless you cut off the top because the way its sealed makes 0 sense whatsoever. You can't open it all the way without having to make some sort of tear or cut. I would much rather have a recyclable tub that has a little less in it. To be honest the "value" you get from the bag is not enough to actually make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Vegan Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is the best vegan protein that I have ever tried. It mixes well, has a neutral taste, and it is super nutritious/healthy!!! Plus, you don't have to worry about arsenic like you do with other rice-based protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie 500

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my smoothies almost every morning. I love that it blends in well, and has doesn't have an overwhelming flavor, so it can be used with any flavor combination I choose.
customer_reviews.author: hrms

customer_reviews.title: Great hemp, bad bad packaging!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The new packaging is a major problem! The bag will not properly seal after you open the bag! This was not a problem with the previous bags. I suspect that the company decided to cut costs by using a cheaper bag. While I absolutely love Nutiva's hemp protein, I do not advise purchasing the large bag! Instead of saving money, I will ultimately lose because the powder will not stay fresh when exposed to air.
customer_reviews.author: melinda m.

customer_reviews.title: Great because of Protein and Fiber but doesn't mix with just water
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and had my first drink this morning. I mixed in water last night and let it sit overnight. It did not dissolve. I shook it up and tried to drink it but it is so grainy it sinks in the water. SO I read more reveiws and it seems like this needs to be mixed into a thicker liquid, like yogurt or oatmeal. I am going to try that next. I'm glad I ordered it a few days earlier because the price went up close $5 for the 3lb size. This seems like a great quality product with both protein and fiber, which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jo

customer_reviews.title: ... i first opened it because the smell is not fantastic but it tastes much better than it smells
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when i first opened it because the smell is not fantastic but it tastes much better than it smells. It is a nutty flavor but I find it quite pleasant. It dissolves mostly very well with the tiniest bit of grit left but nothing I found off putting. I mixed with 16 ounces because I was afraid it was going to be too strong but I think mixing with the 8 ounces written on the container would be just fine. I added syrup and it was very good. Will be ordering this regularly.
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Add to smoothies don't drink by itself
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I don't eat meat and it's hard to always get my necessary protein especially working 12-16 hour days. I add this to my fruit smoothies with soy milk and it doesn't taste terrible, most of the time I drink all of it with no complaints. But it is grainy and that's the worst of it. No matter how much you blend it, I'll still have the grainy after taste. But you get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: tastes great, keeps me full
customer_reviews.text: First protein powder I’ve ever used, and I’m so glad to say it was a great choice. I’m vegetarian and lack on getting the proper protein intake, and I also work out twice a day so I needed to invest in a protein powder. This one is amazing. Can’t taste it, although it is a little gritty once blended, I can hardly tell. The recipe w almond milk, a banana, and the powder is the one I used and I love it. I will update with time, but I say buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of hemp powder but the ziplock seal malfunctions.. which creates freshness issues and then the trouble of me needing a container large enough to store the product. This has happened on several Nutiva items I've purchased over the past 3-4 years. I've contacted them via email with pictures and video of the issue. They responded once, which led me sending a pic and video.. and I've never heard back :( GREAT QUALITY, POOR PACKAGING and POOR CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.author: joshua garbenis

customer_reviews.title: No added junk
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because there is no added sugar or other crap. Hard to find truly healthy products these days but this is one of them. It's a bit chalky if you add too much to your mix. I found that 4 T, 8 oz protein milk and 1 banana make for a pretty good mix. The banana adds sweetness and texture to the drink. Great post workout drink.
customer_reviews.author: VS RN

customer_reviews.title: energy and weight loss
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing stuff. I have four smaller meals a day, this being one of them. I mix four tablespoons with frozen banana, ground flax seed, yogurt and coconut oil and a little milk or almond milk. Combined with exercise I lost twenty pounds over one year.
customer_reviews.author: bertio2000

customer_reviews.title: This is pretty good mixed in almond milk
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good mixed in almond milk. I bought it mostly for the fiber but have benefited from some weight loss as well. Plan on ordering again soon. I replace breakfast and sometimes lunch with this. It gives me plenty of energy!
customer_reviews.author: sheila Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not the right nutrition facts?
customer_reviews.text: i ordered the above and looking at the picture of the nutrition label, i should have 90 calories a serving. But as you can see from my pic, it's 120. Might not order again as the cals are a bit too high for me, but it really does taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Tucker

customer_reviews.title: like a brick
customer_reviews.text: There has been a problem with the packages not being vacuumed sealed. The packages are soft instead of hard, like a brick. I noticed a small slit or hole in a package that was soft. Now I assume the non-vacuumed packs have holes or air seeping. I like this product, but I wish this issue would be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein and fiber
customer_reviews.text: Great source of protein and fiber. Taste isn’t bad at all. I combined with black and blueberries into a smoothie. Be sure to drink immediately after blending as it does seem to separate after sitting for few minutes. I will order again!!!
customer_reviews.author: avery

customer_reviews.title: 3lb resealable bag does not RESEAL!!  $ 34.00 & bag has a 2 cent reseal strip that does not work
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the 3lb bag to try out new product and upon removing a couple of teaspoons could not reseal the bag!! Ridiculous pain in the A$$, transferring 3 lb. of powder to another container. $34.00 and the bag has a built in flaw!! Cheap Cheap Cheap Not the way to build loyalty.
customer_reviews.author: gymdeuce

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like oatmeal!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to taste bitter like an herbal supplement, but I was surprised that the flavor isn't at all overpowering. By itself with some milk, it just tastes like plain oatmeal. I blend it with a banana and 1 cup of unsweetened Silk (or off-brand) coconut milk and it tastes a like liquid banana bread or oatmeal cookies. I have it as a meal replacement mid morning (no breakfast) and it satisfies me until dinner. Adding this to my subscribe and save for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and clean plant-based protein
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this hemp powder in my smoothies every morning for over ten years. It blends great with my veggies and fruit I like it a lot because it has one ingredient: Organic Hemp Seed Powder. No fillers or sweeteners. And each serving has only 80 calories, zero fat, added sugars, sodium or cholesterol while packing 10g of protein. I don’t obsess about protein but it helps make a balanced smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: Leanne M Thorsson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. When you receive this hemp it is a vacuum sealed block, they wasted no space. I use this in my morning smoothies, granted this is a somewhat acquired taste, but it is absolutely packed with nutrients and protein. I have tried other brands that were slightly cheaper, but the other brand tasted chalky and not as much like a actual plant like this product. This product is very fine grain, almost like sand, i guess. I am a active weightlifter and i Highly recommend, i seem to keep buying month after month.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have to wait about 5 minutes to drink my protein shakes once it's been blended because this product is grainy and needs to soften or it gets caught in your throat. Other than that, it's a great product, I don't really know what it tastes like alone because I mix with a chocolate pea protein powder and chocolate collagen powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein!
customer_reviews.text: My protein of choice. As with any protein the flavor is not the reason you buy quality protein. The hemp seed protein in my opinion has a better blending taste when using fruits, almond milk, peanut butter, cinnamon, etc... while being very easy on your stomach when compared to Whey Protein. I also find the hemp seed protein to be a great alternative to not having a dairy protein while being just as healthy and giving you all the benefits of protein.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Organic 100% pur hemp protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Organic 100% hemp protein powder. Flavor is little strong kinda like eating grass but for me it's okay. If you mix it with Cacao powder it helps. I like it because there are no fillers. That what I look for so I'll sacrifice flavor. If you're no willing to sacrifice flavor you want to try another brand that has a more neutral flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It does not need to taste great to serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.text: I was reading some of the reviews and yes it is gritty and the taste is not all that great but your not looking for pudding for gods sake. You should not give it a 1 star just for the packaging, Amazon will refund and give you a new one. I like that it has all the amino's in it it it great for vegans. I give it a 5. The more flavorings they put in it the more crap you will get.
customer_reviews.author: Barb6298

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste-gritty no matter how much I blend it
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was looking for something low sodium and low sugar and decided to purchase this after being used to Vega Vanilla Flavor Protein powder. Boy was this not good at all (as far as taste is concerned) Perhaps it has better nutritional value but the taste is bland. I even blended it with frozen strawberrys and still tasted horrible. Will finish this bag and move on. This will be the one and only purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vigilant

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hemp protein
customer_reviews.text: Ours came fresh, decent packaging, lovely dark green color. I added a hefty amount to some baked honey oatmeal raisin bars and they were delicious, no weird powdery vegetal taste. With smoothies you might want to start with smaller amounts since it can get a little grassy taste if you use too much.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Really good :)
customer_reviews.text: I really love this protein, it doesn’t taste bad neither good. I always put a banana on it so it become more consistent, otherwise it would be gritty. If you’re expecting a delicious flavor, you shouldn’t buy this. You can imagine that this is a plant protein so don’t expect a caramel. My daily shake is a scoop of this protein + scoop of collagen powder + scoop of wheat bran + 1 banana + 1 scoop of ice. Delicious :)!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fabara

customer_reviews.title: Best to mix with another protein powder for better taste
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was a little hard to get into so I had to cut an opening with scissors. Unfortunately the material used for the packaging tears easily so I opted to dump the powder into another container which wasnt a huge deal. I mixed the hemp seed powder with another brand of chocolate flavoured protein powder and all I could taste was delicious chocolate. If the hemp seed powder tastes "earthy" like some other people have commented I wasnt able to tell at all.
customer_reviews.author: bvs

customer_reviews.title: Read great things about this product, but, texture is same as sand
customer_reviews.text: This is the lower protein product, which I found out after buying it. I read many reviews that this was rated at the top. However, if you like the texture of sand, then you will like this. I had stirred and stirred, but a large amount still settled to the bottom of the glass (I use it with soy protein powder and tea mix). This was exactly like green sand. When they say high in fiber, I guess this is it. But it does not appear to be the soluble fiber. I won't be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: pema drolma

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like dirt :(
customer_reviews.text: Decided to try it on a lark. I suppose it depends what you mix it with. I eventually used it in small batches, mixing it with my Dymatize vanilla whey. If you're only interested in protein and not vegan, this is probably not a great option. If you're vegan you probably have lower expectations and can stomach this.
customer_reviews.author: Da Moogs

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE- made me very sick
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this once before and did fine but after ordering this most recent can, I experienced violent uncontrollable vomiting within 3 hours of eating it. The first time I figured it was a stomach virus but the second time a couple weeks later with the exact same timing after eating it.....there’s no question it was the hemp protein. I don’t know if I’ve developed an allergy or if it’s contaminated but BEWARE. I won’t be ordering again either way. It’s not worth feeling so deathly ill.
customer_reviews.author: NCBanks

customer_reviews.title: Just use one scoop...
customer_reviews.text: The serving size is 3 TBSP to get the 15g of protein. Dont eat all 3 Tbsp at once, you wont poop for days. Still has an earthy "plant" taste but easier to cover up in a smoothie than most pea proteins, etc. Blends well, not chunky. Just bummed that I cant load up on protein in one shake.
customer_reviews.author: eleanorstang

customer_reviews.title: Great, clean protein
customer_reviews.text: Took some time to get used to in the beginning (the taste is not like your usual protein powder) but now I just blend it with a banana and absolutely love it. So much more healthy than whey protein and makes me feel less bloated as well! Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: The best plant based protein!
customer_reviews.text: Hemp protein powder has amazing health benefits and is the best plant based protein I have had. Very inexpensive too! I enjoy mixing 4 Tablespoons to get 20 grams of protein with almond milk, half a banana, and a tablespoon of peanut butter. My husband enjoys the protein with almond milk, chia seeds, almond butter, and his greens. Very delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like this protein powder, have bought again. I like that it's just hemp. Put in spinach, banana, blueberry smoothie with coconut milk and it's delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stangland

customer_reviews.title: Don’t rely solely on how foods taste
customer_reviews.text: I believe people think too much about how things taste. If you’re using this product you probably want to increase your fiber and vitality. I have IBS. The high fiber does actually what I want it to do. I add some extra green powder and a teaspoon of instant coffee for energy and I’m good to go. I don’t worry how it taste because the health benefits are good, though this does have a nice, fresh , earthy flavor. I look forward to it every morning. I believe people can get use to anything if they give it a chance . It’s a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: shelley rosenblatt

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Like Rope - Which Is Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good source of simple organic protein. It tastes like drinking rope if you don't mix it with something else but that is exactly what organic hemp protein with no additives should taste like. However, it mixes well in a smoothie or protein shake with fruits or greens to the point where the hemp taste is not nearly as noticeable. It's a good source of protein and fiber and can mix with anything.
customer_reviews.author: tbone

customer_reviews.title: Going back to rice powders
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried a lot of protein powders and can normally handle pretty harsh stuff but this takes the cake. I like my protein drinks to be pretty unsweet and normally only use unsweetened almond milk and blueberries. But I feel this powder needs you to add things loaded with sugar, like bananas to make this drinkable. and if you need to add all this to make it so, it kind of defeats the purpose dont you think? Going back to rice powders.
customer_reviews.author: skibike

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste, maybe healthy? Not worth it to me.
customer_reviews.text: I’d heard that hemp protein is good, so I thought I’d give it a try in my green smoothies. Stuff turns my spinach and fruit smoothies into a sickly brown color. The stuff really tastes horrible. I used about three teaspoons of stevia and that makes the stuff tolerable, but it still overpowers any fruit I have in the smoothie. A after I finish this bag, I’ll move in to something else. Blech!
customer_reviews.author: J Swan

customer_reviews.title: Hemp--It's What's For Breakfast
customer_reviews.text: After years using a soy powder supplement for my breakfast drink, I made the switch to hemp. I mix the recommended 3 Tbl in a shaker cup with water, unsweetened cocoa powder, cinnamon, and stevia. Fills me up and gives me energy for the morning. I'm on plant-based diet, and I feel that this product gives me the extra protein I need.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back before I opened the package after realizing this is just the fiber bi-product after pressing the oils out of the hemp seed (I KNEW the price was too good to be true!). If you're looking for an fiber supplement, go for it. I wanted a complete protein with the fatty acids needed to properly utilize the protein. Hemp seed is amazing for you because of the oils, but without the oils, it's really just fiber. I'll stick with psyllium husk for fiber and went with a whole milled hemp seed for protein.
customer_reviews.author: Cameo

customer_reviews.title: Great for Plant-based Diets
customer_reviews.text: You can't take this as a shot like other protein powders. This powder doesn't necessarily dissolve in liquid, rather disperses quite easily and evenly. If consuming with just almond milk or water, follow instructions and use AT LEAST 8oz of liquid.. otherwise you'll suffer trying to down a thick paste. It's quite good in smoothies though and being plant-based, I'm used to the earthy taste -- it's only truly prominent when consuming with just water anyway. Keeps me full for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Chocopuff B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, simple ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I found this product because it's an excellent source of protein and its sustainable. It doesn't have all the fillers and sugars added which I don't like or need. But it bothers me that the 48 oz package is actually more expensive than the 30 ounce package per ounce. I'm not sure why that is for exactly the same product. Seems like it should be less expensive for a larger quantity per ounce. What gives?
customer_reviews.author: DMan

customer_reviews.title: Review is about packaging
customer_reviews.text: Note! low star review is due to packaging, not the product itself. I'm happy with the product; however I urge for package redesign, specifically the plastic "snap" closing feature - it sucks!!! This is my second time ordering the product and the bag does not close properly because the plastic lining design is very inefficient. The first time I ordered it, I struggled to close it every time, the second package, doesn't close at all. Trader Joe's sells nutritional yeast, and I wish vendors who use these type of packaging (the bags) would learn from trader joe's - they have a seemingly velcro closing design which ensures the package closes properly.
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: YUCK...!!! GROSS...!!! NEVER BUYING AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: My brother-in-law turned me on to this showing that it had protein and lots of fiber. It has a very strong taste, and not a good one. It almost has a similar taste of spirulina, which is literally, algae. This is a really gross and you have to shove tons of fruit in a smoothie to even get rid of the taste, and then that's a extra sugar/CALORIES. I'm slowly making my way through this just so I get my money's worth, and I don't want to waste money, but it is dag nasty and I'll never buy it again. YUCK...!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter R. Salajka

customer_reviews.title: Flavor isn't the best....
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to avoid pea protein that makes up the bulk of most plant based protein powders. Wasn't impressed. The taste is forgettable. It mixes kinda okay. At 15 grams of protein per serving, that's 25% less than most other brands. That makes it a little pricy for a powder that doesn't taste that terrific, and I'm not fussy. Probably won't purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Hemp the Super Food!
customer_reviews.text: Plant based protein and with fiber. The world should eat more of this. I put this in my smoothie every time I make one (mixed with a half portion of whey). Note the texture is not for everyone so I wouldn't buy a bag this big until you're a fan.
customer_reviews.author: nacnud

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it
customer_reviews.text: I started working out during quarantine and didn't have any protein powder (mine was still at school). Looking for a cheap alternative, this was perfect! I liked that it was hemp seed - it seemed lighter but just as effective. I was nervous the taste was going to be too earthy for my liking, but once I had my first sip of it in almond milk I LOVED it. It's super yummy! It has gone somewhat fast though because I'm working out every day, but I still think it's a good deal considering how expensive protein powder is.
customer_reviews.author: Katie A

customer_reviews.title: Will order again
customer_reviews.text: I like this because the flavor isn't bad- isn't chocolate- nor artificially sweetened and a great source of protein
customer_reviews.author: John P. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Gritty - very poor zipper. Not sure product is high quality.
customer_reviews.text: The zipper is so obviously sub par that you have to wonder what else is sub par about the product that the manufacturer knows but you don’t. It’s almost impossible to reseal. It tastes like a fiber supplement. It’s gritty as can be. I can only consider it my fiber supplement and not a source of protein because it feels like a protein dose of the supplement is just an overdose of fiber and grit to the system.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Terrible Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the worst tasting protein I have ever eaten. Tastes like grass flavored sand. When mixed with water ends up being a gritty mess. Didn't try mixing it with anything else. Struggling to finish this container. Might just throw it away before I finish it. Definitely would not order again.
customer_reviews.author: ut oh

customer_reviews.title: First time user of hemp protein
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time buying hemp protein powder. I'm a vegan, usually buy soy protein powder. I'm sort of on the fence, maybe just getting used to the flavor. I mix it with water, ground flax seeds and flavoring, stir with a fork and let it sit for about 10 - 15 min. It is very filling. I'm still trying to figure out the best type of flavoring to add. I may try it again.
customer_reviews.author: SaraTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product - love the nutritional benefits and clean ingredients - can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Florida girl

customer_reviews.title: New Prop 65 Warning! Cancer and Reproductive Harm!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Nutiva Hemp protein on and off for a few years. My most recent batch came with a prop 65 warning label on the side, cautioning against cancer and reproductive harm!! I wil not continue using the one I purchased and will not be buying this brand anymore. I was taking hemp protein to improve my health not pose life threatening dangers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mayers

customer_reviews.title: Complete protein or meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: So far the product has been great i started with the smaller bag and now im hooked. Tasted powdery on its own but blended into a fruit smoothie its awesomenit wont disappear but it tastes good i like the texture between my teeth. I feel less hungry. I poop more and fuller poops doubles the speed of the recovery time after a long day at work or workout. Solid source of protein and nutrients. Its a complete protein
customer_reviews.author: Pentley Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cleanest protein as stated on Dr. Oz show! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mz D

customer_reviews.title: Good product, cheap packaging...
customer_reviews.text: I received my order today and it came with 2 other products in the box from amazon. All were covered with powder. The package was busted open on the side, and when you try to reseal it it doesn’t hold, nothing that a extra large ziplock wouldn’t fix but what a mess. The flavor is really mild and great for what I need it for. Good product, cheap packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great source of protein & fiber for meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: I use this for breakfast when I am in a hurry. It was filling for several hours and it settled in my stomach nicely. It is a bit on the chalky side. I consider myself on a scale of one to ten where 10 is the pickiest, a six on the bothered by food texture scale. Mealy apples forget it, squishy tomatoes never! I give both to my boyfriend! lol :)
customer_reviews.author: MsCarbonated

customer_reviews.title: Great Hemp Protein
customer_reviews.text: I have really been enjoying this protein. The taste isn’t as great as whey protein, but it is certainly manageable and grows on you after a while. I mix it in smoothies with some frozen fruit, almond milk, and either almonds or walnuts. The hemp particles aren’t super fine, but they mix in pretty well and the smoothie isn’t too gritty. I like the fact that the protein also has a decent amount of fiber. I stay full until lunch and eat less throughout the day. Overall I highly recommend this product to anyone who is looking for a great alternative to whey protein.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Makes a delicious blend with pea protein
customer_reviews.text: I mix about half and a half with pea protein , bananas and some frozen fruits for a delicious sport drink . Has a very nice flavor in addition to naked pea protein purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Victor Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great for fruit smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Nutritious?: Check! Delicious?: Not as much It's just hemp protein-- no additives, sugars, or any other bs. This is a double edged sword as it provides optimal nutrition but it isn't super tasty. It's definitely not one of those powders you can just mix into milk or water-- you definitely need other flavors to cover up the "hempiness". But if you're a person who wants to make fruit smoothies with some extra protein, fiber and vitamins with no fillers or sugars this is the perfect fit for that!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: ... trying this because everyone said the flavor was so bad. The flavor is fine and understated
customer_reviews.text: I was so afraid of trying this because everyone said the flavor was so bad. The flavor is fine and understated. I love this! I add it to vanilla almond milk. I also added it to Starbucks hot chocolate with vanilla almond milk. I don't know if drinking it in a hot drink is a problem, but it tasted fine. This is the best tasting protein I've tried. The other ones the taste is too strong to be masked by anything....ugh..... anyway, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Connie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. It blends smooth, leaves no aftertaste, and lends a nutty earthiness to my smoothies. This protein lasts me longer than most foods/protein powders & it doesn't have the chalkiness or grittiness that some do. A win!
customer_reviews.author: teasnob

customer_reviews.title: The taste is not great but if you mix with the right ingredients it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this exclusively for shakes. The taste is not great but if you mix with the right ingredients it is manageable. More importantly this product was inexpensive and true to its advertisements. The protein to fiber ratio is very good (IMHO) and it is a great source of protein for those who prefer plant based protein. I use this with almond milk, a banana, and a little honey and it makes for a great shake.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Manley

customer_reviews.title: Its good for you
customer_reviews.text: I have tasted worse things in my life. I actually mix it half and half with a chocolate protein mix so its not too bad. Those mixed with banana is great. This stuff is great though for real. Plant based protein is the way to go and I can sacrafice a little taste to put something good in my body.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Arnold

product_meta.title: Nutiva Organic Cold-Pressed Hemp Seed Protein Powder, 15G Protein, 16 Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Hemp Protein| Size:1 Pound (Pack of 1)Great product for maximum health benefits.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
